item.title: Wallpaper Pack 92: Asteroid Petal Glow
item.description: Asteroid Petal Glow blends cosmic depth and organic warmth. Violet fades to peach and molten orange â€” a soft explosion of color caught between orbit and ember. Includes 13 wallpapers for desktop, tablet, and mobile, plus a PDF palette and reversed version.
